name: codemirror-plus
description: A collection of add-ons for CodeMirror that can be used individually. Furthermore, addon/builder helps to build feature-rich pre-packaged CodeMirror instance that use many of the addons here and from official distribution. See demo/builder_with_requirejs.html for an example.
author: Sam Lee
//: jshint: pre-2.5.1 or post-2.6.3 breaks in RequireJS environment. Avoid Latest for now.
Dependencies need to be installed to run the demo.
If only individual addon is needed in your application, they may not be necessary.
